Subject: Client notification popups
Description:
Hi Team,
If an user share any sensitive information they need to get pop up that sensitive informatioon is being shared
What_We_Know__c:
Customer can achieve this by creating custom CAP notifications from System Parameters > Device Types and Notifications.
I will add a link towards this section in the user manual so that you may find more informations about this:
https://helpcenter.netwrix.com/bundle/EndpointProtector_5.9.4/page/Content/EndpointProtector/Admin/SystemParameters/Overview.htm#custom_content_aware_protection_notications


27 March: I've connected to them in a session, and they were not receiving the notifications because the Client Mode was on Silent. After changing it to Normal, it was ok.
- I also helped them set up a PII CAP policy, and from the first tests it was successfull for e-mail Adresses.
